column2: ILLINOIS PERMIT TEST
Question Text
1. All vehicles operated in Illinois must be covered by liability insurance.
2. When you want to make a right turn, your vehicle must be:
column4: close to the left side of the street.
column6: near the center of the street.
column8: close to the right side of the street.

column2: 3. What does a flashing left yellow arrow mean?
column6: Vehicles turning left must stop if they can. The light will soon be red.
column8: Left turns are allowed. Yield to oncoming traffic and pedestrians.

column2: 4. This sign indicates:
5. A steady yellow light means:
column6: Be prepared to go. The light will soon be green.
column8: Be prepared to stop for the red light.

column2: 6. Pink is used for:
7. You must signal continuously during the last ____ feet before making a turn.
8. These are:
9. When passing a truck, you should let the driver know you are passing by honking your horn.
10. What do pennant-shaped signs indicate?
11. At a stop sign there is no stop line, you must stop:
12. This sign means:
column4: The divided highway on which drivers are traveling ends ahead.
column6: The highway ahead is divided into two one-way roadways.

column2: 13. Where there is no bicycle lane, where on the road must a bicyclist ride?
column4: near the left edge of the road.
column6: on the left shoulder of the road.
column8: near the right curb or edge of the road.

column2: 14. This road sign means:
column4: Slow down and prepare to stop only if vehicles are approaching you
column6: Come to a full stop, then go when it is safe to do so
column8: Proceed with caution through the intersection without stopping

column2: 15. This sign tells drivers:
column4: they must wait for the traffic signal to turn green before turning right or left.
column6: they may not turn right or left during the red light.

column2: 16. If your license was suspended prior to age 21, you may be required to submit to a complete driver’s license examination to be re-issued a driver’s license.
17. You may find several of these signs:
column4: on the inside of a sharp curve.
column6: just before a divided highway ends.
column8: on the outside of a sharp curve.

column2: 18. Parking a vehicle is prohibited within __ feet of a STOP sign, YIELD sign or traffic control signal.
19. It is permissible to make a right turn against a red signal light after stopping and yielding to other vehicles and pedestrians.
20. What can you do to prevent skids on snow and ice?
column4: Allow the wheels to keep turning.

column2: 21. Passing on a two-lane, two-way roadway is not allowed when the view is blocked within 500 feet of any bridge.
22. What is the meaning of red traffic signs?
column8: Stop, do not enter or wrong way.

column2: 23. What does a yellow arrow signal mean?
column4: The same as the yellow light, but applies only to movement in the direction of the arrow.
column6: Vehicles moving in all directions must stop if they can. The light will soon be red.
column8: The same as a green light.

column2: 24. What happens to your license if you refuse to take a breath or blood test?
column4: Your driver`s license will be taken away.
column6: Drivers cannot be arrested for drunk driving.
column8: Your driver`s license will be cancelled.

column2: 25. When making a lawful turn on a red light after coming to a complete stop, a driver must yield to a pedestrian.
26. On slippery roads, drivers should:
column4: increase their speed to avoid hydroplaning.
column8: leave more space in front of their vehicle.

column2: 27. Drivers often fail to see a motorcycle headed toward them. Why?
column4: It is difficult to judge a motorcycle's speed.

column2: 28. This sign tells drivers that:
column4: left and right turns are not allowed.

column2: 29. Which signs have black letters on a yellow or orange background?
30. If a vehicle starts to skid, the driver should gently apply the brakes and steer in the opposite direction of the skid.
31. This sign means:
column4: You must yield the right-of-way ahead

column2: 32. Illinois law prohibits photography and the use of cellphones within ___feet of an emergency scene.
33. What is the meaning of orange traffic signs?
column6: Warning of school, pedestrian, and bicycling activity.

column2: 34. In Illinois, the minimum legal drinking age is:
35. When following a truck at night, it is important to dim your headlights.
